properties.areaDesc: Lake St. Clair Open Lake (U.S. Portion)
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 9:58AM EST until January 8 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 23 knots from the west
with gusts up to 32 knots. The largest significant waves will
be 2 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 3 feet.

* WHERE...Lake St Clair.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 4 AM EST
Wednesday with the largest waves expected around 5 AM EST
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY
